localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
At $110 billion, Airbnb now has a higher market than the 6 largest hotel chains (Marriott, Hilton, InterContentintal, Hyatt, Wyndham, & Choice) ... combined. 

$ABNB

Chart via @ycharts https://t.co/bFTi88MqqY
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
Airbnb现在的市场规模达到1100亿美元，比6大连锁酒店（万豪、希尔顿、洲际、凯悦、温德姆、& Choice）加起来还要高。

爱彼迎

图表来自@ycharts https://t.co/bFTi88MqqY

Airbnb現在的市場規模達到1100億美元，比6大連鎖酒店（萬豪、希爾頓、洲際、凱悅、溫德姆、& Choice）加起來還要高。

愛彼迎

圖表來自@ycharts https://t.co/bFTi88MqqY
